---
title: "Exports"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load_libraries}
library(readxl)
```

```{r load_data}
BOM_Coal_Exports_1945_1962_copy <- read_excel("BOM_Coal_Exports_1945_1962 copy.xlsx")
View(BOM_Coal_Exports_1945_1962_copy)
```

```{r rename}
colnames(BOM_Coal_Exports_1945_1962_copy)[3] <- "Exports"
```

```{r filter}
Europe_NA <- BOM_Coal_Exports_1945_1962_copy %>%
  filter(Continent == "Europe" | Continent == "North America")
```

```{r plot}
ggplot(data = Europe_NA, aes(y = Exports, x = Year, color = Continent))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()
```
